==== German ====

In the past years this topic was limited to german-speaking websites, where important news (e.g. Call for Paper, end of the Call for Papers etc.) were posted:

** <nowiki>[[http://www.pro-linux.de/news/10/1/news-mitteilen.html|Pro-Linux]]</nowiki>

** <nowiki>[[http://ikhaya.ubuntuusers.de/| Ikhaya ubuntuusers.de]]</nowiki>

==== Mailing lists ====

The most important news were posted to the following lists:

** <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-de-events|ubuntu-de-events]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://lists.ubuntu-eu.org/mailman/listinfo/ubucon-de|ubucon-de]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://lists.ubuntu-eu.org/mailman/listinfo/loco-de|loco-de]]</nowiki>

There was no "official" Ubucon sender address, so individual accounts were used.
